thread.title: Bed and Breakfast Baan Nisarine, Krabi town, including photos - Booking.com
thread.title_full: Bed and Breakfast Baan Nisarine, Krabi town, including photos - Booking.com

title: Bed and Breakfast Baan Nisarine, Krabi town, including photos - Booking.com
text:
Very big and very clean rooms. Friendly staff. Central position. Cinzia, Switzerland Very nice hostel,It's Good value for money and very very clean also my room no smell and I understand and any where in Thailand now it very hot you must understand with my booking if I need more comfortable with air has to pay more for air condition room not angry with hotel because that it your budget .There have hot showers with big bathroom and free coffee at all hours. The staff has been so extremely helpful, I have no problem with the rules here because it gives a good clean hotel. It's in a good location, close to everything just walk 3 minute to morning market and 5 minute to night market ,Would definitely stay here again. Keerati, Thailand Amazing hostel. It's a good price for nice dorms and very, very clean and No smell in my room but after we have many people in room and OK,I understand .There have hot showers with big bathroom and free coffee at all hours. The staff has been so extremely helpful, I have no problem with the rules here because it gives a good clean hotel. It's in a good location, close to everything just walk 3 minute to morning market and 5 minute to night market ,Would definitely stay here again. Ta, Thailand Bed is comfortable, room is a bit stuffy with no air flow in a room with 12 people. Near to various food stalls. Overall satisfying. Ainu, Malaysia Enormous rooms. Good a/c. Useful on site taxi for getting around. Andrew, New Zealand Nice big room... we were in the superior double but the standard double looked pretty spacey too. The room was nicely furnished, clean, and so much storage space! The bathroom was big and clean. Staff were friendly and the wifi worked really well. Location is a little away from the touristy part but if you want to go there it's easily reachable on foot. It is close to the night market and a 7/11 though. Luke, United Kingdom We have been travelling for 3 months and this is the best place we have stayed!!! we loved everything!! The staff were so friendly they even give us a gift when we left!! The location is great!! be sure to hire a scooter to drive up to ao nang, hot springs, tiger temple and emerald pool!! We stayed there for a total of 5 days and if we are ever back in krabi we will be sure to stay here again!!! Kelly, United Kingdom Really helpful staff, helped us organize tours and gave tips on local bars and restaurants. Very near the night market and pub street. The rooms are huge and clean. Jasper, Germany Very good value for money Very clean Big nice room with everything you need Good location close to nightmarket Franziska, Thailand the owner was very helpful and polite. the roomxwas enormously big Arthur, Switzerland Free WiFi 8.1 
Baan Nisarine is 450 yards from the city centre. It is within a 5-minute walk from Weekend Night Market. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. 
Wat Kaew Korawaram is 550 yards from Baan Nisarine, while Krabi Pier - Klong Jirad is 1.5 miles away. It is a 20-minute drive from Krabi Airport. 
Rooms here come with either a fan or air conditioning. Both private and shared bathroom facilities are available. Select rooms offer a balcony and a cable TV. 
Other facilities offered at this property include a ticket service and a tour desk. 
A range of Thai and international restaurants are located within a 5-minute walk away. This is our guests' favourite part of Krabi town, according to independent reviews. We speak your language! Baan Nisarine has been welcoming Booking.com guests since 25 Mar 2014. Bed and breakfast: 14 rooms Most popular facilities
